tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_table (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  quiz_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  assessment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_online (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    quiz_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_in_person (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    assessment_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE learning_recommendations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    recommended_quiz_id INT,
    recommended_assessment_id INT
);
